aggregate.name: nbVehicules
nbCartesEssence
aggregate.value: var output = 0, carteEssenceColName = 'Carte essence' ; if(node) { var carteEssenceValue = node.rawNode[carteEssenceColName] ; if(carteEssenceValue && (carteEssenceValue.toLowerCase() == 'oui')) { output = 1 ; } if(node.children) { node.children.forEach(function(child) { output += child.rawNode.nbCartesEssence ; } ) ; } } return output ;

aggregate.name: nbRemisages
aggregate.value: var output = 0, remisageColName = 'Autorisation de remisage' ; if(node) { var remisageValue = node.rawNode[remisageColName] ; if(remisageValue && (remisageValue.toLowerCase() == 'oui')) { output = 1 ; } if(node.children) { node.children.forEach(function(child) { output += child.rawNode.nbRemisages ; } ) ; } } return output ;
